meanings.definition: A puzzling or inexplicable occurrence or situation.
meanings.sent1: The enigmata of the missing key left everyone confused.
meanings.sent2: The enigmata of the strange lights in the sky puzzled the scientists.
meanings.sent3: The enigmata of the talking cat made the children giggle.
meanings.sent4: The enigmata of the locked door was like a riddle waiting to be solved.
meanings.sent5: The enigmata of the ghostly figure haunted the old mansion.

meanings.definition: A person or thing that is mysterious, puzzling, or difficult to understand.
meanings.sent1: She was an enigmata in our class, always keeping to herself.
meanings.sent2: The ancient artifact was an enigmata to the historians.
meanings.sent3: The enigmata of the silent neighbor intrigued the neighborhood.
meanings.sent4: His enigmata of a smile hid his true feelings.
meanings.sent5: The enigmata of the masked hero captivated the city.
